title: An inside look at how Figma ships product
excerpt: Designing the fastest way to keep an entire company up-to-date on our roadmap using a Coda doc and a bit of social engineering.

title: Figma's Features for the Entire Design Process | Toptal
excerpt: Can one program handle the entire digital product design process? Learn how Figma, a web-based design tool, promotes collaboration, iteration, and documentation throughout the design process. #product #mobile #app #design #digital #ui #ux
